segments.text: I observe the kitchen from this angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying a plate attentively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight filters through the window nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink overflows steadily onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water drips down the cabinet fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's reaching high on his stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate while grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready to catch her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet I can't shake this uneasy feeling about the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It might tip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle could make everything slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR
